description:
Mr. Hell`s senpai has arrived to deliver a hellish ultimatum. Under her watchful eye, Mr. Hell must perform an insidious ritual and finally create hell on earth!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Creating Hell! And Then into the Hellfire... / A Hellish Ending
Jigoku Souzou! Soshite Jigoku e... / Jigoku no Owari
地獄創造! そして地獄え... / 地獄のおわり
